alert.note: Alert for Greene; Lenoir (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 11:42AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Greene and northwestern Lenoir Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1142 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walnut Creek, or near La Grange, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kinston, La Grange, Snow Hill, Dawson, Institute, Jason, Kinston Regional Jetport, Hookerton, Castoria, Fort Run VFD and Shine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
